text: Sydney Jay Mead (July 18, 1933 – December 30, 2019) was an American industrial designer and neofuturistic concept artist. He was known for his designs for science-fiction movies such as Blade Runner, Alien and Tron. Mead was born in Saint Paul, Minnesota. Mead died of lymphoma in Pasadena, California on December 30, 2019 at the age of 86.Syd Mead Dies: Visionary Futurist Who Worked On ‘Blade Runner’ & ‘Tron’ Was 86 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American designers Category:American science fiction writers Category:Writers from Pasadena, California Category:Writers from Saint Paul, Minnesota
title: Syd Mead
